snippet: Terrence McNally’s satire about theater people has recouped its $3.9 million capitalization, becoming the first show of the 2014-15 season to announce that it has turned a profit.
abstract: Terrence McNally’s satire about theater people has recouped its $3.9 million capitalization, becoming the first show of the 2014-15 season to announce that it has turned a profit.

headline.main: 'It's Only a Play' Recoups on Broadway
headline.print_headline: It May Be Only a Play, but It’s Making Money
